attributes.action: instruct the Mayor for London to stop the council tax surcharge for the 2012 Olympic Games in recognition ot Tessa Jowell's statement on BBC TV on 15 March that the Games will benefit the whole of Britain.   In these circumstances there is no reason why London council taxpayers alone should be singled out for additional payments.
